title: HAICOSYSTEM: An Ecosystem for Sandboxing Safety Risks in Human-AI Interactions
summary: AI agents are increasingly autonomous in their interactions with human users and tools, leading to increased interactional safety risks. We present HAICOSYSTEM, a framework examining AI agent safety within diverse and complex social interactions.
